Package Controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountCreationController.AccountCreationControllerListener
    Interface used to communicate with ScreenHandler.
    AccountModificationController.AccountModificationControllerListener
    Interface used to communicate with ScreenHandler.
    LoginScreenController.LoginScreenControllerListener
    Interface used to communicate with ScreenHandler.
    MainPageController.MainPageControllerListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountController
    This abstract class is used for account controllers (create and modification) because they have similarities
    AccountCreationController
    Handles account creation screen behaviour.
    AccountModificationController
    Handles account modification screen behaviour.
    LatexController
    Handles all requests regarding the TikZ source code coming from View.
    LoginScreenController
    Handles login screen behaviour.
    MainPageController
    Controller of the main page which handles interactions on the main page
    PredefinedShapesPanelController
    This class is the controller which handle messages from the predefined panel defined in the view to the creation of a shape instance
    ScreenHandler
    Main controller class used to decide which screen to show depending on the notifications received from lower tier controllers using interfaces
    Session
    Class that controls the current session, including the logging in, the logging out and the account creation.
    ShapeMenuController
    Handles shape creation using a popup, and controls interactions with the popup
